title: True Wicca 121 Year Old Lost Spells! Ouanga Bags! Found in a Real Witch's Trunk!
features: Forumulas/Recipes Found in a True Witch's Trunk
Made on Wednesday nights at midnight
Each one comes with its own specific chant and simple instructions
description: My Great Grandmother was a well Known Witch in Upstate New York. Her name was Lady Isabel. When she died, my Grandmother, her daughter, inherited a trunk that contained her collection of spells. My Grandmother, in turn, left them to me when she passed on. Found in this trunk was a file containing all of her old formulas/ingredients and incantations for Ouanga Bags, also known as Mojo and/or Charm bags. Before offering these "Ouanga Bags" (spell bags) Just chose the spell you would like from the list below. Remember that all spells are only as powerful as the energy and focus one puts into them. Tell me the Spell you would like with your payment in the message area or just email me with your choice. Spell to Banish Poverty Spell to Keep Love True Spell to Bind Two Lovers Spell to get a Marriage Proposal Spell to Keep a Rival away Spell to Silence Gossip Spell to have a Wish Come True Spell to Restore a Lover's Affection Spell to Get a Raise Spell to Overcome Shyness Spell to Mend a Broken Heart Spell to Stop Infidelity Spell for Willpower (Dieting, Quit Smoking, etc.) Spell for Good Riddance to a Third Party Spell to Attract Friendship Spell for Happiness in Marriage Spell to Make You Irresistible to Opposite Sex Spell to Make You Irresistible to Same Sex Spell for Fertility Spell to Incite Passion Spell for Gambling Luck Spell for Sexual Magnetism Spell to Attract a Wealthy Mate Spell for Forgiveness Spell to Ward off Stress Spell to Find a Good Job Spell to Get an Ex to Return Spell to End Depression Spell to Win in Court Spell to Spice up your Love Life Spell to Meet Your Intended Spell to Protect a Loving Relationship Spell to Get Money from Scratch Tickets/Lottery Spell for Good Luck Spell to End Back Pain Spell for Uncrossing Spell for Protection from Evil Spell to Reciprocate Love Spell to Banish Pain All Spell Bags are shipped on Thursdays as they have to be made on Wednesdays at midnight per Lady Isabel's instructions.
